ValidationRule.description: Reporting Type must be 'External', if Storage Levels is 'BOM Component' and Writeback and Reporting Relevant options are enabled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( cgcloud__Is_Storage_Level_Bom_Component__c = true, cgcloud__Storage_Options_Writeback__c = true, cgcloud__Reporting_Relevant__c = true, NOT(ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Reporting_Type__c,'External')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reporting Type must be 'External', if Storage Levels is 'BOM Component' and Writeback and Reporting Relevant options are enabled.
